eheth janadhipathini chandrika kumaranathunga eda agamathi ranil wika්ramasinta erehiwa pawichchi karana lada wasarak sampurnawimen pasu parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harime thurumpuwa maitha්ripala sirisena janadhipathiwarayata agamathi ranil wika්ramasinhata erehiwa pawichchi kala nohakiya. 19 wani sanshodhanaya janadhipathiwarayata thibunu ee balaya ahimi kara thibe. 19 wani sanshodhanaye wiyamana hondin pariksha karana wita mema nithi sampadanayata gambhira penumak labadima sandaha wiwidha de athulath kara thibunada eya agamathiwarayage aarakshawa pa්ramukha wadagath sadhakayak lesa salaka sakas kara thibena nithi sampadanayak bawa therum ganima amaru natha.
